author: arnetheduck
content: hey <@!203220829473996800> , is zcli gonna get the 0.10 treatment?

author: arnetheduck
content: we'd like to use it to figure out if the invalid sig test has a a broken randao as well - we had a false positive on that test that's concerning (ie we had a bug in the signature check and the test should not have passed, but it passed anyway because it aborted on randao, and we only check abort-or-not on those tests

author: protolambda
content: <@449019668296892420> zcli needs v0.10 BLS, sorry :(. I'll look into it, but have been distracted with network testing and phase2. Randao is interesting, I wonder if any caching in spec, or slot transition skips, could have caused it. Maybe compare with other clients? I'll look into updating zcli Tuesday, I'm traveling home tomorrow.
